attributes.name: flag
attributes.description: optional flag the tab, eg. `new`, `alert`, or `error`

attributes.name: flag-icon
attributes.description: optional flag icon the tab, eg. `av:fiber-new`, `icons:warning`, or `icons:error`

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: icon for this tab, eg. `maps:local-airport`, `maps:local-bar`, or `notification:wifi`

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: the unique identifier and anchor for the tab

properties.name: flag
properties.description: optional flag the tab, eg. `new`, `alert`, or `error`

properties.name: flagIcon
properties.description: optional flag icon the tab, eg. `av:fiber-new`, `icons:warning`, or `icons:error`

properties.name: icon
properties.description: icon for this tab, eg. `maps:local-airport`, `maps:local-bar`, or `notification:wifi`

properties.name: id
properties.description: the unique identifier and anchor for the tab

events.name: a11y-tab-changed
events.description: handles any change in the tab attributes

attributes.name: active-tab
attributes.description: the id of the active tab

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: whether the tabbed interface is disabled

attributes.name: hidden
attributes.description: whether the tabbed interface is hidden

attributes.name: icon-breakpoint
attributes.description:
the minimum breakpoint for showing tab text with icons, or
- use `0` to always show icons only
- use `-1` to always show text with icons

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: unique identifier/anchor for the tabbed interface

attributes.name: layout-breakpoint
attributes.description:
the minimum breakpoint for horizontal layout of tabs, or
- use `0` for horizontal-only
- use `-1` for vertical-only

attributes.name: responsive-size
attributes.description:
the size of the tabs,
where `xs` is the smaller breakpoint
and `xs` is the larger breakpoint

attributes.name: vertical
attributes.description: whether the tabbed interface is in vertical layout mode

properties.name: activeTab
properties.description: the id of the active tab

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: whether the tabbed interface is disabled

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: whether the tabbed interface is hidden

properties.name: iconBreakpoint
properties.description:
the minimum breakpoint for showing tab text with icons, or
- use `0` to always show icons only
- use `-1` to always show text with icons

properties.name: id
properties.description: unique identifier/anchor for the tabbed interface

properties.name: layoutBreakpoint
properties.description:
the minimum breakpoint for horizontal layout of tabs, or
- use `0` for horizontal-only
- use `-1` for vertical-only

properties.name: responsiveSize
properties.description:
the size of the tabs,
where `xs` is the smaller breakpoint
and `xs` is the larger breakpoint

properties.name: vertical
properties.description: whether the tabbed interface is in vertical layout mode
